articles.title: Telephone Message to US Forces Side
articles.content:
Telephone Message to US Forces Side
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- It has been brought into bolder relief  that the case of warship "Cheonan" sinking was a conspiratorial farce and charade orchestrated by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces from A to Z with the passage of time.
					 Meanwhile, the international community is getting increasingly sympathetic with the DPRK's principled stand that it would dispatch an inspection group of its National Defence Commission.
					
					 Much upset by this development, the U.S. imperialists are running the whole gamut of tricks to hide up the truth about their anti-DPRK smear campaign.
					
					 They made much fuss conducting an "investigation" into the "case" by setting in motion even a bogus mechanism called "Armistice Commission" under the "UN Forces Command" which had already been defunct. Not content with this, they even sent to the DPRK's side a ridiculous notice proposing "general-level talks" in order to brief it on its "results."
					
					 Such behavior of the U.S. imperialists is a revelation of a sinister design to zealously instigate the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors to the confrontation and war with fellow countrymen and thus put into practice their policy of stifling the DPRK.
					
					 In this regard the head of the DPRK side to the DPRK-U.S. military general-level talks sent the following reply notice to the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces' side on Sunday:
					
					 It is preposterous that they conducted the "investigation" by using the "Military Armistice Commission" though it was beyond its mandate and it was more absurd to put the "results of investigation" on the table of the talks.
					
					 It is as clear as noon that the "results of investigation" on the part of the "MAC" touted by the U.S. forces side will only represent "the results of the joint investigation" full of fabrications and plots announced by the south Korean puppet authorities.
					
					 By origin our intention was to dispatch our inspection group to south Korea from the very day the authorities linked the case with us and then open north-south high-level military talks to discuss the results of the inspection. 
					
					 We still remain unchanged in our stand to open the above-said military talks and probe the truth about the case. 
					
					 If the south Korean authorities respond to our proposal, we will promptly come out for a working contact for the opening of the military talks. 
					
					 The working contact will discuss the issue of sending the inspection group of our National Defence Commission to the spot of south Korea for successfully ensuring the proposed high-level military talks, the time and venue for opening the talks, the composition of delegations of both sides and other working matters. 
					
					 The U.S. forces side should no longer meddle in the issue of the north-south relations under the name of "UN Forces Command."
					
					 Its continued interference in this issue would only further increase our suspicions about the U.S. 
					
					 The U.S. imperialists should bear in mind that it is the most reasonable way of settling the "Cheonan" case to accept this fair and aboveboard proposal of ours.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers' Saber-rattling under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers' Saber-rattling under Fire
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces staged ground operation exercises with areas of Kyonggi and south Korean Kangwon provinces as operational theatres, firing live shells, from June 9 to 22. Meanwhile, the first fleet of the puppet navy and maritime police conducted joint drills for dropping depth bombs and naval bombardment exercises in the waters of the East Coast with more than ten combat warships including destroyers and patrol craft and copters involved.
					 They are contemplating staging extremely provocative combined naval warfare maneuvers in the West Sea of Korea with a flotilla of a U.S. nuclear-powered carrier involved and conducting PSI maritime intercepting and searching drills aimed at the blockade against the DPRK. 
					
					 The Secretariat of the Committee for Peaceful Reunification of Korea in its information bulletin No. 959 issued on Sunday bitterly denounced the reckless and frantic moves of the puppet warmongers to start a war of aggression against the DPRK as unpardonable acts of treachery as they bring the second Korean War to the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 This is, at the same time, a blatant challenge to the desire of the Koreans for peace and reunification of the country, a grave provocation to the DPRK and an open declaration of military confrontation with it, the bulletin noted, and went on:
					
					 The puppet group of traitors, thrown into a bottomless quagmire after being forsaken by the public for its sycophancy and treachery to serve the U.S., confrontation with fellow countrymen and unpopular rule, cooked up the shocking case of warship sinking under the backstage wirepulling of its American master. When the group suffered a heavy defeat in the "elections to the local self-governing bodies" despite what it called "north wind" raised by groundlessly linking it with the DPRK, it got more frantic in its racket for a war of aggression against it, crying out for "punishment" and "resolute retaliation" and the like. 
					
					 The reality clearly indicates that the above-said puppet group is the most faithful servants of the U.S. imperialists and the ferocious warmongers unaware that they are digging their own graves.

articles.title: Second Int'l Preparatory Meeting for 17th WFYS
articles.content:
Second Int'l Preparatory Meeting for 17th WFYS
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The 2nd international preparatory meeting for the 17th World Festival of Youth and Students took place at the People's Palace of Culture on June 26 and 27.
					 Present there were President of the World Federation of Democratic Youth Tiago Alexandre Ferraz Vieira and his party, a delegate of the Communist Youth of Greece, a delegate of the Namibian Ministry of Youth, a delegation of the African National Congress Youth League of South Africa, a delegation of the South African Students Congress, a delegation of the National Democratic Youth Federation of Nepal, a delegate of the All Nepal National Free Student Union, a delegate of the German Socialist Working Youth, a delegate of the Lao People's Revolutionary Youth Union, a delegate of the Democratic Youth Union of Lebanon, a delegate of the UJASRIO-Sahara Occidental, a delegation of the Revolutionary Youth Union of Syria, a delegate of the Socialist Youth Union of Sri Lanka, a delegate of the Democratic Youth Union of Senegal, a delegation of the Democratic Youth Federation of India, a delegate of the All-India Youth Federation, a delegate of the Jordanian Democratic Youth Union, a 
					
					 delegate of the Communist Youth Union of Spain, a delegation of the Ho Chi Minh Communist Youth Union of Vietnam, a delegate of the Palestinian Youth Organization, a delegation of the Union of Young Communists of Cuba, a delegate of the United Democratic Organization of Youth of Cyprus, a delegation of the Portuguese Communist Youth, a delegate of the Latin American Continental Student Organization and a delegate of the General Union of Arab Students.
					
					 On hand were a delegation of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League and a delegation of the Korean Youth League in Japan.
					
					 Participants of the meeting watched a video showing the 13th World Festival of Youth and Students.
					
					 Ri Yong Chol, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, in his congratulatory speech expressed deep gratitude to the WFDY for condemning the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK at the world festivals of youth and students held in the past in the noble idea of the anti-imperialist solidarity, peace and friendship and conducting positive activities for supporting the just cause of the Korean people.
					
					 The youth and students of the DPRK will creditably discharge their responsibility and mission in developing the world youth and students movement and make positive efforts to ensure that the forthcoming festival would provide a platform for friendship, unity and solidarity with the progressive youth and students in their efforts to build a new peaceful world, opposed to aggressions and war of imperialism.
					
					 The meeting was held divided into regional sessions in the wake of the plenary session.
					
					 The meeting was briefed on the formation of national preparatory committee of each country to participate in the 17th WFYS and its activities and on the activities of the National Preparatory Committee of South Africa which is sponsor of the festival.
					
					 It also discussed the issues concerning the program of the festival and formation of the international festival organizing committee.
					
					 The draft program of the festival was confirmed and the standard for forming the international festival organizing committee and the contents of its action decided at the meeting.
					
					 It was decided to conduct the election of the international festival organizing committee at the third international preparatory meeting to be held in Cyprus.
					
					 The meeting was an international gathering conducive to ensuring the successful holding of the 17th WFYS to be held with the desire and wish of the progressive youth and students to strengthen the movement for the world festival of youth and students.

articles.title: Foreign Youth Delegations and Delegates Feted
articles.content:
Foreign Youth Delegations and Delegates Feted
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League hosted a reception on Sunday at Chongnyon Hotel in honor of the delegations and delegates of youth and students organizations from different countries and regions of the world.
					 Present there on invitation were Tiago Alexandre Ferraz Vieira, president of the World Federation of Democratic Youth, and his party and the delegations and delegates of youth and students organizations of different countries and regions and members of the delegation of the Korean Youth League in Japan that participated in the 2nd international preparatory meeting for the 17th World Festival of Youth and Students and the international solidarity events of youth and students for support to the just cause of the Korean people.
					
					 First Secretary Ri Yong Chol and other officials of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League were present there.
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: Rev. Han Sang Ryol Attends Service at Chilgol Church
articles.content:
Rev. Han Sang Ryol Attends Service at Chilgol Church
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Rev. Han Sang Ryol of south Korea attended Sunday service at Chilgol Church today.
					 Present there were officials of the Christian Federation of Korea and believers of Chilgol Church.
					
					 Pastor Hwang Min U of Chilgol Church officiated the service.

articles.title: US Wholly to Blame for Korean War
articles.content:
S. Korean Police Walks Away Students
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- With no trick to evade the blame for the Korean War can the U.S. imperialists cover up their crimes and true colors as the provocateur of the Korean War, says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a signed article.
					 The Korean War was a war of injustice and aggression conducted under the prearranged and classified scenario of the U.S. from A to Z, the article points out, citing the following historical facts and data to prove it:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists' military operation plan for an invasion of the DPRK was worked out in a "perfect way" and all the preparations for attack on the northern half of Korea were rounded off in May 1950.
					
					 On June 18, 1950 Dulles visited south Korea on "special mission" given by U.S. President Truman and instructed traitor Syngman Rhee to launch an attack on the DPRK and, at the same time, conduct the propaganda that "north Korea was the first to start the 'invasion'".
					
					 Later he flew to Tokyo where he met the U.S. Far East Forces Commander MacArthur, Defense Secretary Johnson and Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff Bradley to discuss the method and procedures for provoking the Korean War and fix June 25, 1950 as the date for launching the war.
					
					 Then, this scenario was agreed at a joint meeting of the U.S. president and brass-hats of the Joint Chiefs of Staff and the departments of State and Defense of the U.S. and finally approved by Truman.
					
					 After that the U.S. imperialists staged an unprecedentedly intensive offensive of deception and camouflage on the eve of the war in a bid to ensure the sudden provocation of the war and simultaneously shift the blame for it on to the DPRK.
					
					 Meanwhile, the brass-hats of the U.S. Far East Forces Command and the south Korean puppet military took their positions and were on standby.
					
					 At dawn of June 25, 1950, the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet clique commenced their surprise armed invasion of the northern half of Korea without issuing any declaration of war.
					
					 The cunning U.S. imperialists saw to it that the U.S. Far East Forces Command issued, through the "chief of the General Staff" of the south Korean puppet forces, an order to start the overall armed invasion of the northern half of Korea.
					
					 As soon as the south Korean puppet forces crossed the 38th parallel, the U.S. imperialists hurled into the Korean War their forces which had been on standby.

articles.title: All Koreans Called upon to Adhere to Joint Declaration
articles.content:
All Koreans Called upon to Adhere to Joint Declaration
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- It is urgently required by the present reality to adhere to the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and preserve the successes made in the era of independent reunification under the banner of the said declarations.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday observes this in a signed article. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 A big hurdle is lying in the way of accomplishing the cause of June 15 due to the vicious moves of the anti-reunification forces.
					
					 It is deplorable, indeed, that all the achievements made in the implementation of the June 15 declaration have been brought to naught and the great march of the fellow countrymen for reunification is facing a blatant challenge due to the reckless moves of the south Korean conservative authorities for confrontation against reunification.
					
					 The frantic moves of the Lee Myung Bak group for confrontation and war were prompted by its sinister aim to completely efface the June 15 era from the minds of the south Korean people so that its spirit might not be revived. The present grave reality goes to prove that if the Koreans fail to implement the inter-Korean declarations no matter how good they are, they can neither protect the successes made in their implementation nor promote the cause of independent reunification. We Koreans realize more keenly than ever before how precious the June 15 joint declaration is, standing at the crossroads of peace or war and the nation's survival or death after the complete disappearance of excitement and joy over the developing inter-Korean relations.
					
					 There will be independent reunification and peace and prosperity only when the cause of the June 15 era is upheld and glorified to the last.
					
					 All Koreans in the north and the south and abroad should launch a dynamic struggle, united close under the banner of the June 15 declaration in hearty response to the appeal made in the joint statement issued by political parties and organizations of the DPRK and meet all challenges of the anti-reunification forces and fling open the gate to national reunification.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Visit to "Cemetery of UN Forces" Censured
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Visit to "Cemetery of UN Forces" Censured
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea visited the "cemetery of war dead of the UN forces" at a time when dishonest anti-DPRK events were taking place one after another there on the occasion of the day of the outbreak of the Korean War. It was reported that the incumbent south Korean "president's" visit to the "cemetery" was the first of its kind in 44 years. 
					  Rodong Sinmun Sunday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 Lee's visit to the "cemetery", where his predecessors hesitated to go, was a foul deed that could be done only by a traitor steeped to sycophancy and treachery to the marrow of his bones and extremely keen on confrontation with fellow countrymen and war for invasion of the DPRK.
					
					 The hideous crimes committed by the U.S. imperialists, mercenaries from its satellite countries and the south Korean puppet forces in the Korean War can neither be hid nor can the burning hatred of the Korean people for the killers and their determination to take revenge upon them be quelled no matter how much water may flow under bridge.
					
					 The cursed behavior of traitor Lee is an intolerable insult to the people mercilessly killed by the aggressors and a blatant challenge to all Koreans who vow to take revenge upon the murderers.
					
					 In April last when he visited the United States, the traitor talked about "sacrifice and devotion of the war participants", asserting that the U.S. aggression on Korea was "a motive force" for "development". Recently he made such a disgusting show as expressing "thanks" through leading media of those countries which participated in the last Korean War, toeing the U.S. line, and sending "letters of thanks" to the former mercenaries.
					
					 This goes to prove that his visit to the "cemetery" was by no means fortuitous but it was designed to beautify the last war of aggression against the DPRK and provoke another Korean war.
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that the Korean nation can never escape the repetition of the June 25 tragedy in case such reckless anti-DPRK provocative farces of the south Korean puppet authorities are allowed to go on.
					
					 Every sin brings its punishment with it. The Lee Myung Bak group will surely face a stern punishment for desperately escalating the confrontation with the DPRK, blocking national reconciliation, unity and reunification.

articles.title: Stop to Suppression of Organization Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Stop to Suppression of Organization Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- At least 340 professors of law and lawyers of south Korea called a press conference outside the Seoul District Prosecutor's Office on June 24, at which they made public a declaration denouncing the puppet prosecution for its suppression of the Citizens' Solidarity for Democratic Society.
					 They held in the declaration that the interpretation of a letter of the solidarity expressing doubts about the "Cheonan" sinking as sympathy, praise and encouragement to the stand of the DPRK was a typical example of the wrong application of the "National Security Law".
					
					 They demanded that the prosecution authorities stop at once an investigation into the citizens and the organization which raised opinions about the "results of investigation" into the case of the warship sinking.

articles.title: S. Korean Police Walks Away Students
articles.content:
S. Korean Police Walks Away Students
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet police on June 22 walked away a student of Songsin Women's University and a student of Kwangwoon University.
					 The police is conducting an investigation into the students, keeping them in custody at a police station on the charges that they distributed literature reflecting doubts about the "results of investigation" into the case of the "Cheonan" sinking in the university town and the like.
					
					 Earlier, the police took away another student of Kwangwoon University on the same charge. It pressurized the student to answer to the question as to whether there were not the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration and the Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration behind the case.
					
					 In this regard people of various circles of south Korea are becoming more critical of the police for working hard to invent a pretext for cracking down upon specified organizations after labeling them "forces behind the case", far from investigating those responsible for it.

articles.title: Significant Days of DPRK Observed
articles.content:
Significant Days of DPRK Observed
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibitions were opened in Russia, Bulgaria, Serbia and Mexico between June 13 and 17 to commemorate the 46th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 On display in their venues were works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, photos on the immortal exploits of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu, books and photos introducing Songun Korea and handiworks associated with wisdom and skills of Koreans.
					
					 Meetings were held in Britain and Switzerland on June 12 to mark the above-said occasion and the 10th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					
					 Speeches were made at the functions.
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting held in Switzerland.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Reminiscences Published in Ethiopia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Reminiscences Published in Ethiopia
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Vol. 3 of Part 1 The Anti-Japanese Revolution of President
					 Kim Il Sung's reminiscences "With the Century" was published by the Penguin Printing Press Publishing House of Ethiopia on June 19.

articles.title: Struggle of WPK and Korean People Supported in India
articles.content:
Struggle of WPK and Korean People Supported in India
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- A. B. Bardhan, general secretary of the National Council of the Communist Party of India, met the DPRK ambassador to India on June 23.
					 The CPI bitterly denounces the south Korean authorities for having cooked up the case of warship "Cheonan" under the patronage of the U.S. and driven the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of a war, the general secretary said, and went on:
					
					 The CPI highly estimates the progress made in the movement for Korea's reunification after the adoption of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and holds that the blame for the recently collapsed inter-Korean relations is entirely on the Lee Myung Bak "government's" policy of confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 The CPI expresses full solidarity with the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people in their struggle.
					
					 We will as always stand by the Korean people in their struggle for the country's reunification.
